reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan soft, comfortable, stylish, and of great quality. They appreciate its warmth, with one noting it's warm without being too weighty. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits great, others mention it runs very large.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Flowy, and So Easy to Throw On
items.body: I love this cardigan so much. It has that perfect boho drape and the knit feels warm and soft without being heavy. It instantly makes any outfit look cute and put together. Great for fall days when you just want something comfy and stylish. Read more
items.author: Emily Swanson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and flattering sweater
items.body: So soft! Love this sweater. I have had many compliments on it. It was on sale when I purchased it, so it was a great value for the money. I probably could have sized down one size, but I am happy overall with the fit. I did buy sweater clips to attach to it to keep it from sliding off my shoulders, but that's just a personal preference. The colors were close to what is pictured. The sweater is warm without being too weighty. The longer style is very flattering. Read more
items.author: Caitlin McGraw

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooooo soft
items.body: So soft and fluffy I love it so much. It does run big so I sized down and it's perfect it still feels oversized and comfy. Very happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: Donna Moore

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars very lightweight - not good for warmth - but it is pretty
items.body: very thin - it's pretty but not much good to keep warm. Plus, it runs not just loose but big. ordered a medium - feels like a 1X Read more
items.author: jerelyn m.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: So soft and good quality! True to size too and you get exactly what the picture shows. Love it! Read more
items.author: Kari F.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs very large
items.body: Loved this sweater! It's so soft, warm and very nice quality, but it runs very large. I had to return and order a size smaller than what I normally wear. Read more
items.author: Susan Evans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Love ! I ordered xxl- 5”7 170 returned for xl and it fits great ! So soft comfy Read more
items.author: kate Liegey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as long as photo shows. More wide
items.body: This is ok. The cut is honestly kind of strange. When other reviews mentioned it “running big” I assumed it meant like overall including length. It is big. I got the medium and I’m 5’2” 160lbs and it’s not as long as the picture in the model shows, it’s boxier/wider than I expected. It’s is super soft and I wish it had pockets. I’m gonna keep it, but not my favorite purchase. Read more
items.author: Ashley

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Multicolor White and Brown, Beige, Multicolor Brown, Black, Light Pink, Coffee Brown, Dark Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
